E

executeQuery(String) - Static method in class server.server
Sends a SQL SELECT query to be executed on the SQLServer database (calls the getResultSet() function) and returns a modified ResultSet.

Executes a SQL INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE query on the SQL Server.
